body_html:
@cy89, yes. I don't know how this passed the presubmit build tests, but it did. Must be missing some mkl coverage. MklCPUAllocator::allocator_ should now have type VisitableAllocator* not Allocator*.
The implementation is a BFCAllocator, as here:
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/common_runtime/mkl_cpu_allocator.h#L95
